description: Looking for articles written by Georgia Brisco? Check out all of Georgia Brisco's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogGeorgia Brisco Georgia Brisco Georgia is a marketing writer for Similarweb. After cutting her teeth at London agencies and writing for the legislature-changing Project 84, she co-founded a boutique brand storytelling consultancy. Her joy is distilling detailed topics into engaging narratives. Outside of words, Georgia’s hunting down cinnamon crêpes with mates, waist-deep in podcasts, or ocean-bound. Her prose has appeared in various journals. Show more Marketing Intelligence The Best Affiliate Marketing Tools in 2023 Affiliate Marketing by Georgia Brisco 10 Min.
